step1.title: List Your Project
step1.description: Connect your GitHub, describe your project, and set your auction parameters. We verify ownership automatically.

step2.title: Receive Bids
step2.description: Buyers discover and bid on your project. Watch the auction unfold in real-time with on-chain transparency.

step3.title: Secure Escrow
step3.description: When the auction ends, funds are held in trustless escrow on Solana. No middleman, no risk.

step4.title: Transfer & Release
step4.description: Transfer assets to the buyer, confirm receipt, and funds are released automatically. Simple.

escrow.title: Trustless Escrow
escrow.description: Funds are held in Solana smart contracts, not our wallets. Release happens automatically when both parties confirm.

settlement.title: Instant Settlement
settlement.description: No waiting for banks. Solana transactions settle in seconds.

ownership.title: Verified Ownership
ownership.description: We verify GitHub ownership before listing. Automated checks ensure legitimate transfers.

global.title: Global Access
global.description: No country restrictions. Anyone with a wallet can buy or sell. Crypto-native with fiat rails for everyone.

disputes.title: Fair Disputes
disputes.description: If something goes wrong, our dispute system ensures fair resolution with evidence review.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of builders buying and selling digital products on the most trusted marketplace.

about.title: About App Market
about.subtitle: The trusted marketplace for digital products

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We're building the most trusted platform for buying and selling digital products, powered by blockchain technology.

values.title: Our Values
values.securityDesc: Every transaction is protected by on-chain escrow.
values.transparencyDesc: All transactions are verifiable on the blockchain.
values.communityDesc: We're building together with our users.

howItWorks.title: How App Market Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Buy and sell digital products with confidence. Trustless escrow, verified ownership, and fair dispute resolution.

forSellers.title: Sell Your Project
forSellers.subtitle: Turn your side projects into cash. List in minutes, get paid securely.

step1.title: Connect Your GitHub
step1.description: Link your GitHub account to verify ownership of the repository you want to sell.

step2.title: Create Your Listing
step2.description: Describe your project, add screenshots, specify what's included, and set your auction parameters.

step3.title: Receive Bids
step3.description: Watch as buyers discover your project and place bids. Set a reserve price or enable Buy Now.

step4.title: Escrow Protection
step4.description: When your auction ends, funds are locked in our Solana smart contract escrow.

step5.title: Transfer Assets
step5.description: Transfer the GitHub repo, domain, and any other assets to the buyer.

step6.title: Get Paid
step6.description: Once the buyer confirms receipt, funds are automatically released to your wallet.

forBuyers.title: Acquire a Project
forBuyers.subtitle: Skip months of development. Buy a working product and make it your own.

step1.title: Browse & Discover
step1.description: Explore our curated marketplace of apps, prototypes, and MVPs.

step2.title: Verify & Research
step2.description: Review the project details, check the seller's reputation, examine the demo.

step3.title: Place Your Bid
step3.description: Bid on projects or use Buy Now for instant acquisition.

step4.title: Funds in Escrow
step4.description: Your payment is held securely in our smart contract.

step5.title: Receive Assets
step5.description: The seller transfers the GitHub repo, domain, and other assets to you.

step6.title: Ownership Secured
step6.description: Once you confirm receipt, you're the new owner!

features.title: Built for Trust
features.subtitle: Every feature designed to make buying and selling secure and fair.

escrow.title: Trustless Escrow
escrow.description: Built on Solana smart contracts. Funds are never held by us.

payment.title: Multiple Payment Options
payment.description: Pay with SOL, USDC, or credit card.

verified.title: Verified Ownership
verified.description: We verify GitHub ownership before any listing goes live.

disputes.title: Fair Dispute Resolution
disputes.description: Evidence-based decisions, 2% fee to the losing party.

fees.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
fees.subtitle: No hidden fees. You know exactly what you're paying.
fees.losingParty: Only charged to the losing party if a dispute occurs

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join the marketplace where builders buy and sell digital products with confidence.

sellers.title: Seller's Guide
sellers.subtitle: Everything you need to know to successfully sell your project on App Market

step1.title: Create Your Account
step1.description: Sign up with GitHub to verify your identity and build trust with buyers.

step2.title: Prepare Your Project
step2.description: Gather all assets: code, documentation, credentials, and access tokens.

step3.title: Create a Listing
step3.description: Provide detailed information about your project, including tech stack and metrics.

step4.title: Set Your Price
step4.description: Choose between auction or fixed price, set starting/reserve prices.

step5.title: Publish & Promote
step5.description: Once live, share your listing and respond to buyer inquiries promptly.

sellers.whatToInclude: What to Include in Your Listing

practice1.title: Use Quality Screenshots
practice1.description: Include clear, high-resolution images showing your project's key features and UI.

practice2.title: Be Transparent with Metrics
practice2.description: Provide accurate data about users, revenue, and growth. Honesty builds trust.

practice3.title: Respond Quickly
practice3.description: Answer buyer questions promptly to increase confidence and close deals faster.

practice4.title: Prepare for Transfer
practice4.description: Have all access credentials ready before listing to ensure smooth handoff.

cta.title: Ready to List Your Project?
cta.subtitle: Start selling your digital products with secure on-chain escrow

buyers.title: Buyer's Guide
buyers.subtitle: How to safely buy and evaluate projects on App Market

benefits.escrowDesc: Your funds are held securely until you receive all assets
benefits.verifiedDesc: All sellers are verified through GitHub authentication
benefits.qualityDesc: Curated marketplace of real, functional projects

step1.title: Browse & Search
step1.description: Explore listings by category, tech stack, or metrics. Use filters to find exactly what you need.

step2.title: Evaluate the Project
step2.description: Review screenshots, code quality, metrics, and seller ratings. Ask questions if needed.

step3.title: Place a Bid or Buy Now
step3.description: For auctions, place competitive bids. For fixed-price listings, click Buy Now to proceed.

step4.title: Secure Payment & Escrow
step4.description: Funds are held in blockchain escrow until you confirm receipt of all project assets.

step5.title: Receive Assets & Confirm
step5.description: Seller transfers GitHub repo, credentials, domain, etc. Verify and release escrow.

checklist.item1: Verify GitHub repo exists and code matches the description
checklist.item2: Check commit history for recent activity and quality
checklist.item3: Review tech stack compatibility with your needs
checklist.item4: Validate claimed metrics (users, revenue) if possible
checklist.item5: Research seller's reputation and past sales
checklist.item8: Confirm all promised assets are listed
checklist.item9: Check for any outstanding issues or bugs

tip.label: Tip:
tip.text: Don't rush! Take time to evaluate thoroughly. Ask the seller questions before committing.

flag1.title: Vague descriptions
flag1.description: Lack of detail about features, tech stack, or metrics

flag2.title: No demo or screenshots
flag2.description: Unwillingness to show the actual product

flag3.title: Unverified metrics
flag3.description: Claims that can't be verified or seem too good to be true

crypto.title: Solana (SOL/USDC/$APP)
crypto.description: Pay directly with crypto. Low fees and instant settlement on Solana.

protection.seller: Sellers are guaranteed payment after confirmed transfer
